name: road maintenance | road maintenance | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10941/documentation

The dataset represents the expenditures and interventions due to the operation and maintenance of road networks. The operation and maintenance of roads refers to aspects of lighting, weed control, line marking, etc. rather than the replacement and repair of road sections. It is therefore directly related to km use. The renewal of different road layers and eventual road disposal is accounted for in the road construction datasets. All environmental exchanges refer to one meter and year (m*year). Road operation and maintenance is therefore modelled as a constant renewal rather than as a one-time expenditure, and is assumed directly related to road use in km. In the transport datasets the value of 1.29E-03 m*year per km of transport should be applied. For freight transports this is then devided by the load transported to give road maintenance demand per metric ton*km. The dataset is based on a modeling of Swiss motorways and Class 1, 2 & 3 roads as described in the following sources: ;;Bundesamt für Statistik (2000) Mobilität in der Schweiz. Ergebnisse des Mikrozensus 2000 zum Verkehrsverhalten. Bundesamt für Statistik, Bern.;;Maibach et al. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. INFRAS, Zürich.

The dataset starts with expenditures for the continual operation and maintenance of roads. 

The dataset ends with emissions to the environment. 

The dataset includes the energy for road operation and the materials used in road maintenance. It includes the NMVOC emissions to air from the solvent containing paint as well as salt used for de-icing which runs off to surface water. The dataset does not include road construction and disposal.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/421:Construction of roads and railways/4210:Construction of roads and railways

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Road lenght is based on Swiss statistical data (2000). The material consumption represents a situation in the early 1990ties.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data refers to average conditions in Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: In order to account for the environmental interventions due to road operation and maintenance generic data for the Swiss road infrastructure is employed. The figures presented are based on inventories generated by Maibach et al. (1999). The data is presented for 1 meter of road and 1 year. Different road types have been distinguished; namely motorway (Nationalstrassen) and three different classes (1st class road, 2nd class road and 3rd class road) of the Swiss Road network. For all categories, the expenditures for operation and maintenance are recorded. 1500t of solvent containing paint per year is used on Swiss roads, 25% of which is solvent based. The dataset assumes that all solvent is emitted as NMVOC.;References:;Maibach M., Peter D. and Seiler B. (1999) Ökoinventar Transporte: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Transportsystemen und den Einbezug von Transportsystemen in Ökobilanzen. Technischer Schlussbericht. In: Schweizerischer Nationalfonds zur Förderung der wissenschaftlichen Forschung (ed. SPP Umwelt M.). 2nd Edition. ;Stolz J. (2001) Luftschadstoff-Emissionen von Strassenbaustellen. Teil I: PAH und VOC. Nr. 126. Bundesamt für Umwelt, Wald und Landschaft (BUWAL), Bern;BUWAL (1995) Handbuch: Emissionsfaktoren für stationäre Quellen. Bundesamt fuer Umwelt, Wald und Landschaft, Bern;Wresowar M. and Sieghardt M. (2000) Studie über die Auswirkung stickstoffhältiger Auftaumittel. Auswirkungen auf Boden und Bewuchs. Vergleich mit herkömmlichen Auftaumitteln. pdf-file from http://www.magwien.gv.at/ma22/pool/doc/auftaumittel.pdf.;Hüsler W., Willi E., Meier E., Bachmann P. and Brodkowski L. (1989) Verkehrsflächen der Schweiz: Groberhebung. zur Raumplanung. Bundesamt für Raumplanung (BRP), Bern as pdf-File under: N;BfS (2000) Mobilität in der Schweiz. Ergebnisse des Mikrozensus 2000 zum Verkehrsverhalten. Bundesamt für Statistik, Bern;BFE (2003) Gesamte Erzeugung und Abgabe Elektrischer Enegie in der Schweiz. 1991. Bundesamt für Energie, Bern, Online-Version under: http://www.energie-schweiz.ch/.
